com.aevi.led

Class LedService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.led.LedService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AeviService

    public class LedService
extends java.lang.Object
implements AeviService
    The LedService provides control over the led on the Aevi device. To simply turn on the led a call can be made to setLedColour(int) passing an integer representing the chosen Color (Note: Any alpha channel values will be ignored brightness of the LED can be controlled using relative values in RGB). To turn off the LED the cancel() method can be used. A sequence can also passed to the service which will call a sequence of LED colours according to the parameters given. The example below will flash the LED 3 times then hold the final value. See LedSequenceParams for details on the parameters passed along with the LedPhase array. 
     
 LedPhase[] phases = new LedPhase[6];
 int rate = getSelectedLedRate();
 phases[0] = new LedPhase(Color.TRANSPARENT, rate);
 phases[1] = new LedPhase(Color.RED, rate);
 phases[2] = new LedPhase(Color.TRANSPARENT, rate);
 phases[3] = new LedPhase(Color.RED, rate);
 phases[4] = new LedPhase(Color.TRANSPARENT, rate);
 phases[5] = new LedPhase(Color.RED, rate);

 LedSequenceParams params = new LedSequenceParams(false, true);
 service.setLedSequence(phases, params);

    Please see the LedServiceProvider on how to initialize this service.

    See Also:
    TerminalConfiguration.isLedApiUsable()

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels the connection to the LED service
        Throws:
        AeviServiceConnectionException - if unable to connect to the LED service

      • enable

        @Deprecated
public void enable(android.app.Notification notification)
        Deprecated. 
        Enables the LED service
        Parameters:
        notification - A Notification object holding information regarding the lights to set
        Throws:
        AeviServiceConnectionException - if unable to connect to the LED service

      • setLedColour

        public void setLedColour(int colour)
        Set the LED to a solid continuous colour until cancelled or overwritten by another process
        Parameters:
        colour - The Color to set the LED to

      • setLedSequence

        public void setLedSequence(LedPhase[] ledPhase,
                  LedSequenceParams params)
        Set a sequence of colours and pass them to the LED. Each LedPhase consists of a colour and an amount of time to hold the colour for.
        Parameters:
        ledPhase - Array of LedPhase objects
        params - object containing options such as, repeat sequence or hold last LedPhase see LedSequenceParams

      • createIntent

        public static android.content.Intent createIntent()
        Creates an Intent that can be used to bind the LedService.
        Returns:
        an Intent that can be used to bind the LedService.
